name: Hololive ID Rumble
description:
When Ollie, Anya, and Reine are hunted down by a mysterious figure, they have to punch their way through some guys to find out who it is. Calling this game rough would be and understatement and it's mad jank, but it was fun to make. Thanks for coming to check it out!

Controls

Z - Punch X - Kick C - Guard [Space] - Jump

I didn't take a picture of this one sorry guys

→→ Z or X - Dash Attack Destroy Stuff → Pick Up Weapons  → ??? → Profit?

The enemies brought fists to what they didn't know was a gun fight. Find health items/weapons around the stage that can help turn the tide of battle. 

Credits

Big ups to Jose Manuel for the security guard model and the BIGGEST of ups to chained_tan who made the Ollie model (the best looking thing in this game) and helped me with some Unity nonsense. Their sketchfab can be found here!
